title: Local Hour: Chris Nowinski on Tua Injury
description:
Dan, Stugotz, Witty, Mike Ryan, and Chris Cote discuss Tua Tagovailoa's head injury sustained during Thursday Night Football. The crew dives into the NFL concussion protocol, how they view last week's injury in relation to this one, and the rapid response across social media. Then, neuroscientist and founder of the Concussion Legacy Foundation, Chris Nowinski, joins Dan to break down the injury and what he believes the repercussions should be.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
